text: Werner Klemperer (March 22, 1920 â€“ December 6, 2000)Weinraub, Bernard "Werner Klemperer, Klink in 'Hogan's Heroes,' Dies at 80" New York Times (December 8, 2000) was a German-born American stage, movie, and television actor and musician. He won an Emmy Award in 1968 and in 1969. Klemperer died of cancer on December 6, 2000, aged 80, at his home in Manhattan, New York City. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * *Werner Klemperer at concentric.net *Klemperer's parents, Otto and Johanna, 1920s portrait by Nickolas Muray * * Interview with Werner Klemperer by Bruce Duffie, July, 1985 Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1920 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German musicians Category:Actors from Cologne
title: Werner Klemperer
